select dd.create_time,IFNULL(r.num,0) as 'num' from( select ADDDATE(#{endTime},INTERVAL -d.id+1 day) as 'create_time' from t_demo_count d order by d.id desc ) dd left join ( select t.creat_time,count(t.id) as 'num' from nj_report_statistics t where t.creat_time > ADDDATE(#{endTime},INTERVAL -7 day) and t.creat_time < ADDDATE(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 day)
GROUP BY t.creat_time ) r on r.creat_time=dd.create_time

select dd.create_time,IFNULL(r.num,0) as num from( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(#{endTime},INTERVAL -day(#{endTime})+1 day),INTERVAL -d.id+1 MONTH),'%Y-%m') AS create_time FROM t_demo_count d WHERE d.id <= 6 ORDER BY d.id DESC ) dd left join ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(creat_time,'%Y-%m') AS creat_time,COUNT(*) AS num FROM nj_report_statistics GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(creat_time,'%Y-%m') ) r on r.creat_time=dd.create_time
